title: debug

---

Logs a debug message to the console if the log level allows it.

## Import

```ts
import { Logger } from "@aa-sdk/core";
```

## Usage

```ts
import { Logger } from "@aa-sdk/core";

Logger.debug("Something is happening");
```

## Parameters

### msg

`string`
The message to log

### args

`...any[]`
Additional arguments to pass to the console.debug method
